description: DLLs that are specified in the AppInit_DLLs value in the Registry key HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Windows are loaded by user32.dll into every process that loads user32.dll
name: New DLL Added to AppInit_DLLs Registry Key
query: ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\Windows\\AppInit_Dlls OR *\\SOFTWARE\\Wow6432Node\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\Windows\\AppInit_Dlls) OR NewName:(*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\Windows\\AppInit_Dlls OR *\\SOFTWARE\\Wow6432Node\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\Windows\\AppInit_Dlls)) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.Details:"\(Empty\)")))
author: Ilyas Ochkov
oscd.community
Tim Shelton
